summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 1st Avenue West, from West Prospect Street to West Highland Drive; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 102294 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
